author: Special Correspondent
text:
A second year engineering student attempted to end her life by jumping off the Thiru. Vi. Ka Bridge at Adyar on Monday night. She took the extreme step as her parents chided her.

The girl studying at an engineering college in Guindy jumped around 9.30 p.m. and she survived as there was only slush at the spot where she fell.

Passers-by who had seen the girl jumping off the bridge, informed the police. She was rushed to a private hospital near-by.

Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 044 24640050.
title: Girl attempts suicide as parents chide her
